Darkfate::

"Right" said Darkfate "By now, your leader had my promise of no 
agression-deal, just when I've spoken with my allies and I speak with 
Zardus I can say that it's a alliance... If you have inconvenient one 
of my probes will follow you while you're in my territory -I have 
several psicotic bots and I don't like a fight when a good alliance 
it's around. "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Perndabot::
> 
> Perndabot nods. "Yeah. You'll contact me when your allies return, 
> right?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Darkfate::
> >
